solution_line_template: First find the time Marcy spends combing the cat: {petting_time} minutes / {combing_divisor} = <<{petting_time}/{combing_divisor}={combing_time}>>{combing_time} minutes

Then add that to the time spent petting the cat to find the total time she spends with it: {combing_time} minutes + {petting_time} minutes = <<{combing_time}+{petting_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} minutes
